# The `FwdRegParamInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents a parameter whose call site value can be described by applying a debug expression to a register in the forwarded register worklist. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct FwdRegParamInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Represents a parameter whose call site value can be described by applying a debug expression to a register in the forwarded register worklist.
